active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a group discussion, debate the role of DFDs in the application security lifecycle: How do they bridge design review (entry domain: Threat Modeling and Design Review Tools) to testing tools? Use real-world examples like the Equifax breach to argue if DFDs could have prevented data exposure. Cite benefits from NIST SP 800-53 or OWASP.
